title: I HAVE 1 FPS PLZ HELP
body: so after i factory reset my pc i was finally able to boot up league. i went in a game and i had 1 fps(i normally have 40 50 60) it was like having 600 700 ping yet my ping was 19 the usual. i have restarted my pc and tried to repair and reinstall league multiple times yet nothing works.plz help

replies.body:
FPS issues can be caused by a number of factors, however, the most common are problematic graphics drivers or a corrupt installation of League. As a first step, I recommend taking a look at the solutions in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). 

Let me know if you noticed any change after taking those steps.
omg thxs so much it was the amd drive it was outdated since i factory reset my pc thx u!!!!!!!! it was thru uptade check to see if driver out of date
